# Core Docs

- [.NET distribution packaging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/distribution-packaging.md): Learn how to package, name, and version .NET for distribution.

## .NET SDK

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/sdk.md): Learn about the .NET SDK (formerly known as the .NET Core SDK), which is a set of libraries and tools used to create .NET projects.

## Get started

- [Hello World](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/get-started.md): Create a Hello World .NET app.

## Overview

- [Introduction to .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/introduction.md): Learn about .NET. .NET is a free, open-source development platform for building many kinds of apps.
- [Build apps with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/apps.md): .NET can be used for building many kinds of apps.
- [Releases, patches, and support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/releases-and-support.md): Learn about releases, patches, and support for .NET.

## Publishing

- [Runtime Identifier (RID) catalog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/rid-catalog.md): Learn about the runtime identifier (RID) and how RIDs are used in .NET.
